member.name: M:Sage.Ssdp.Security.Client.IAutoUpdateService.VerifyAndUnpack(Sage.Ssdp.Security.Client.ISoftwareUpdate,System.String)
member.summary: If an external tool has been used to download a update this method MUST be used to verify and unpack the update before it can be installed.
member.param: the update to check
the full file path of the update
member.returns: if the verify and unpack was successful this will be an empty string - otherwise a message stating the issue will be returned

member.name: M:Sage.Ssdp.Security.Client.IAutoUpdateService.CheckForUpdatesWithFeeds(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Check for updates and feeds on the selected autoupdate server using the product id and version. the locale will be assumed to be en_GB. the OS information will be automatically determined.
member.param: The product id of the installed product for example ssdp.test.app1
The current version of teh installed product
The date to limit the feed check by - any updates created or modified before this date will not be displayed
member.returns: An object containing updates and feeds

member.name: M:Sage.Ssdp.Security.Client.IAutoUpdateService.CheckForUpdatesExWithFeeds(Sage.Ssdp.Security.Client.IApplicationInstall,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Check for updates on the selected autoupdate server using the application install object.
member.param: Object containing information about the installed product including any number of additional attributes
The date to limit the feed check by - any updates created or modified before this date will not be displayed
member.returns: A response object containing An array of updates and an array of feeds
